text: Melani Leimena Suharli (born 27 January 1951) is an Indonesian politician from the Democratic Party who has been a member of the People's Representative Council since 2009. Between 2009 and 2014, she was the deputy speaker of the People's Consultative Assembly. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian politicians Category:People from Jakarta Category:Democratic Party (Indonesia) politicians
title: Melani Leimena Suharli
